practice_phrases: I'm not going to stop.
我不会停止。
I'm not going to come back.
我不会回来。
I'm not going to stop talking.
我不会停止说话。
I'm not going to learn his name.
我不会学会他的名字。
I'm not going to find out the answer.
我不会找出答案。
I'm not going to want to meet people who speak Chinese.
我不会想认识会说中文的人。
I'm not going to speak Chinese with you.
我不会和你说中文。
I'm not going to come back with everyone else later.
我不会晚点和其他人一起回来。
I'm not going to meet at six o'clock this evening.
我不会今天晚上六点见面。
